title: Omloop Het Nieuwsblad: Video Debrief
content:
February 27, 2021

Rouleur magazine editor Andy McGrath, and Rouleur contributors Amy Jones and Joe Timms dissect the day's racing action

The WorldTour one-day season got underway with Omloop Het Nieuwsblad.

Across the men's and women's race, we saw two world champions in the ascendancy and the dominance of SD Worx and Deceuninck-Quick Step. Rouleur editor Andy McGrath, and Rouleur contributors Amy Jones and Joe Timms discuss winners, losers and what this means for the forthcoming spring Classics.

Related – The 2021 Men's Early Season: The Rouleur Racing Guide 
Related – The Women's 2021 Early Season: The Rouleur Racing Guide
author: Miles Baker-Clarke
